item.title: By: Blackmoore
item.dc:creator: Blackmoore
item.description:
Fun fact. lots of players actually miss Fornost, and several times i have meet lvl 40's grinding them thru pre quests while saying "wtf there's a camp here?"
Shitloads of quests outside, and a huge instance with the curiosity of an actuall Instance within the instance" even. I love the place
item.content:encoded:
Fun fact. lots of players actually miss Fornost, and several times i have meet lvl 40’s grinding them thru pre quests while saying “wtf there’s a camp here?”

Shitloads of quests outside, and a huge instance with the curiosity of an actuall Instance within the instance” even. I love the place

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Yes, that's Tusker, Queen of the Ele-fantasymobname-phants, in Nagrand.
And in LOTRO, that's Fornost (the instance zone-in, as opposed to the Fields and the outside ruins). Gotta love 'em, there's 42 billion group quests offered for Fornost.
item.content:encoded:
Yes, that’s Tusker, Queen of the Ele-fantasymobname-phants, in Nagrand.

And in LOTRO, that’s Fornost (the instance zone-in, as opposed to the Fields and the outside ruins). Gotta love ’em, there’s 42 billion group quests offered for Fornost.

item.title: By: Kevan
item.dc:creator: Kevan
item.description: Now that I got my baby elekk from the orphan quest I think I should take him to meet the Queen...
item.content:encoded: Now that I got my baby elekk from the orphan quest I think I should take him to meet the Queen…

item.title: By: celerie
item.dc:creator: celerie
item.description: isn't that like the queen of the elekks or something? standing on that ramp-like hill in SW nagrand? i dunno, i did those quests at warp speed with guildies and haven't seen her since.
item.content:encoded: isn’t that like the queen of the elekks or something? standing on that ramp-like hill in SW nagrand? i dunno, i did those quests at warp speed with guildies and haven’t seen her since.
